title: The preachers proclamacion Discoursing the vanity of all earthly things, and proouing that there is no contentation to a Christian minde, but onely in the feare of God. Henry Smith.
author: Smith, Henry, 1550?-1591.
publisher: By[E. Allde? for] William Kearney dwelling within Creeple-gate,
